mapper.sql: t1.ID, t1.DIC_WDMC_ID, t1.GROUP_ID,t1.PATH,t1.REPORT_DATE, t1.CREATED, t1.CREATER, t1.UPDATED, t1.UPDATER, t1.DEL_FLAG,t1.DIC_STATE,t2.name as group_name, t1.BYZCRS,t1.SYZCRS,t1.CHANGE_BYZJ,t1.CHANGE_QMJCJZ,t1.CHANGE_SJZX, t1.CHANGE_SW,t1.CHANGE_QTYY,t1.CLASS_GZ,t1.CLASS_HX ,t1.CLASS_JS, t1. CLASS_ZYJWZX,t1.CLASS_BDZZQL,t1.TYPE_WHGJAQZ, t1.TYPE_WHGGAQZ, t1.TYPE_PHSHZYSCJJZXZ,t1.TYPE_QFGMRSQLZ,t1.TYPE_QFCCZ,t1.TYPE_FHSHGLZXZ, t1.TYPE_TWHLZ,t1.TYPE_DZZ,t1.TYPE_OTHER,t1.REG_CITY,t1. REG_VILLAGE, t1.SEX_MALE,t1.SEX_FEMALE,t1.AGE_U18, t1.AGE_19TO45, t1.AGE_46TO60, t1.AGE_61P, t1.PRAISE_QTJL,t1.PRAISE_SJZX, t1.PRAISE_QTCF, t1.PRAISE_SZACF, t1.ZFXZ, t1.REG_OTHER,t1.NATION_HAN, t1.NATION_FEW,t1.QUALIFICATION_JUNIOR, t1.QUALIFICATION_SENIOR,t1.QUALIFICATION_MIDDLE,t1. QUALIFICATION_PRIMARY, t1.WORK_STUDY, t1.WORK_ON , t1.WORK_NOJOB, t1.PRAISE_SQJL, t1.PRAISE_SQCF, t1.PRAISE_CDJX, t1.JZBYTG , t1.TOTAL_ACCEPT,t1.TOTAL_RELIEVE,t1.TOTAL_CRIME_AGAIN,t1.REPORT_TIME,t1.RETURN_REASON,t1.RETURN_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into SF_CULPRIT_TJ ( ID, DIC_WDMC_ID, GROUP_ID, PATH,REPORT_DATE, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG, DIC_STATE,BYZCRS,SYZCRS,CHANGE_BYZJ,CHANGE_QMJCJZ, CHANGE_SJZX, CHANGE_SW,CHANGE_QTYY,CLASS_GZ,CLASS_HX ,CLASS_JS, CLASS_ZYJWZX,CLASS_BDZZQL,TYPE_WHGJAQZ, TYPE_WHGGAQZ,TYPE_PHSHZYSCJJZXZ, TYPE_QFGMRSQLZ,TYPE_QFCCZ,TYPE_FHSHGLZXZ,TYPE_TWHLZ,TYPE_DZZ,TYPE_OTHER, REG_CITY,REG_VILLAGE, SEX_MALE,SEX_FEMALE,AGE_U18, AGE_19TO45, AGE_46TO60,AGE_61P, PRAISE_QTJL,PRAISE_SJZX, PRAISE_QTCF, PRAISE_SZACF, ZFXZ, REG_OTHER,NATION_HAN, NATION_FEW,QUALIFICATION_JUNIOR,QUALIFICATION_SENIOR,QUALIFICATION_MIDDLE,QUALIFICATION_PRIMARY, WORK_STUDY, WORK_ON , WORK_NOJOB, PRAISE_SQJL, PRAISE_SQCF, PRAISE_CDJX, JZBYTG , TOTAL_ACCEPT,TOTAL_RELIEVE,TOTAL_CRIME_AGAIN, REPORT_TIME,RETURN_REASON,RETURN_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicWdmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{dicState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{byzcrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{syzcrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{change_byzj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{change_qmjcjz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{change_sjzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{change_sw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{change_qtyy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{class_gz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{class_hx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{class_js,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{class_zyjwzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{class_bdzzql,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{type_whgjaqz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type_whggaqz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{type_phshzyz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{type_qfgmrsqlz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type_qfccz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{type_fhshglzxz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type_twhlz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{type_dzz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{type_other,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reg_city,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{reg_village,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{sex_male,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sex_female,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{age_u18,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{age_19to45,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{age_46to60,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{age_61p,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{praise_qtjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{praise_sjzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{praise_qtcf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{praise_szacf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{zfxz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{reg_other,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nation_han,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{nation_few,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qualification_junior,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qualification_senior,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{qualification_middle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{qualification_primary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{work_study,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{work_on,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{work_nojob,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{praise_sqjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{praise_sqcf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{praise_cdjx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jzbytg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{total_accept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{total_relieve,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{total_crime_again,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{reporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{returnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update SF_CULPRIT_TJ
DIC_WDMC_ID= #{dicWdmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH=#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_DATE=#{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DIC_STATE = #{dicState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BYZCRS=#{byzcrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYZCRS=#{syzcrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGE_BYZJ =#{change_byzj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGE_QMJCJZ= #{change_qmjcjz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGE_SJZX=#{change_sjzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGE_SW=#{change_sw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGE_QTYY= #{change_qtyy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_GZ=#{class_gz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_HX= #{class_hx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_JS= #{class_js,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_ZYJWZX= #{class_zyjwzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_BDZZQL= #{class_bdzzql,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_WHGJAQZ=#{type_whgjaqz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_WHGGAQZ= #{type_whggaqz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_PHSHZYSCJJZXZ= #{type_phshzyz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_QFGMRSQLZ = #{type_qfgmrsqlz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_QFCCZ =#{type_qfccz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_FHSHGLZXZ= #{type_fhshglzxz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_TWHLZ = #{type_twhlz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_DZZ=#{type_dzz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_OTHER = #{type_other,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_CITY = #{reg_city,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_VILLAGE= #{reg_village,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEX_MALE =#{sex_male,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEX_FEMALE=#{sex_female,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGE_U18=#{age_u18,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGE_19TO45= #{age_19to45,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGE_46TO60= #{age_46to60,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGE_61P=#{age_61p,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRAISE_QTJL=#{praise_qtjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRAISE_SJZX = #{praise_sjzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRAISE_QTCF=#{praise_qtcf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRAISE_SZACF =#{praise_szacf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZFXZ = #{zfxz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_OTHER=#{reg_other,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NATION_HAN= #{nation_han,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NATION_FEW= #{nation_few,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUALIFICATION_JUNIOR= #{qualification_junior,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUALIFICATION_SENIOR=#{qualification_senior,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUALIFICATION_MIDDLE= #{qualification_middle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUALIFICATION_PRIMARY= #{qualification_primary,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WORK_STUDY =#{work_study,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WORK_ON = #{work_on,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WORK_NOJOB= #{work_nojob,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRAISE_SQJL= #{praise_sqjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRAISE_SQCF= #{praise_sqcf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRAISE_CDJX = #{praise_cdjx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JZBYTG = #{jzbytg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_ACCEPT =#{total_accept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_RELIEVE=#{total_relieve,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_CRIME_AGAIN = #{total_crime_again,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPORT_TIME= #{reporttime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURN_REASON= #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURN_TIME=#{returnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_CULPRIT_TJ set GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BYZCRS = #{byzcrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SYZCRS = #{syzcrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGE_BYZJ = #{change_byzj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGE_QMJCJZ = #{change_qmjcjz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGE_SJZX = #{change_sjzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGE_SW = #{change_sw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGE_QTYY = #{change_qtyy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_GZ = #{class_gz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_HX = #{class_hx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_JS = #{class_js,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_ZYJWZX = #{class_zyjwzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_BDZZQL = #{class_bdzzql,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_WHGJAQZ = #{type_whgjaqz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_WHGGAQZ = #{type_whggaqz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_PHSHZYSCJJZXZ = #{type_phshzyz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_QFGMRSQLZ = #{type_qfgmrsqlz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_QFCCZ = #{type_qfccz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_FHSHGLZXZ = #{type_fhshglzxz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_TWHLZ = #{type_twhlz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_DZZ = #{type_dzz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE_OTHER = #{type_other,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_CITY = #{reg_city,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_VILLAGE = #{reg_village,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEX_MALE = #{sex_male,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEX_FEMALE = #{sex_female,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGE_U18 = #{age_u18,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGE_19TO45 = #{age_19to45,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGE_46TO60 = #{age_46to60,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGE_61P = #{age_61p,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRAISE_QTJL = #{praise_qtjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRAISE_SJZX = #{praise_sjzx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRAISE_QTCF = #{praise_qtcf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRAISE_SZACF = #{praise_szacf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZFXZ = #{zfxz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_OTHER = #{reg_other,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NATION_HAN = #{nation_han,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NATION_FEW = #{nation_few,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUALIFICATION_JUNIOR = #{qualification_junior,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUALIFICATION_SENIOR = #{qualification_senior,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUALIFICATION_MIDDLE = #{qualification_middle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUALIFICATION_PRIMARY = #{qualification_primary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WORK_STUDY = #{work_study,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WORK_ON = #{work_on,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WORK_NOJOB = #{work_nojob,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRAISE_SQJL = #{praise_sqjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRAISE_SQCF = #{praise_sqcf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRAISE_CDJX = #{praise_cdjx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JZBYTG = #{jzbytg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_ACCEPT = #{total_accept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_RELIEVE = #{total_relieve,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_CRIME_AGAIN = #{total_crime_again,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIC_STATE = #{dicState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_WDMC_ID = #{dicWdmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPORT_TIME = #{reporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RETURN_REASON= #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURN_TIME=#{returnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT where group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t left join sys_group t1 on (t.group_id=t1.id) where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm') and t.FINISH_INTO='0'

select count(*) from SF_FINISH_REDRESS t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_IMPRISON t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.IMPRISON_DATE,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.IMPRISON_DATE,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_DEATH t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.DIC_HKLX_KEY=#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.DIC_HKLX_KEY not in ('12001','12002')
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.dic_Sex_Key=#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.NATION=#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.NATION not in('104001')
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.DIC_WHCD_KEY=#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.DIC_WHCD_KEY in('19007','19008','19009')
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.DIC_WHCD_KEY in('19003','19004','19005','19006','19010')
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.DIC_WORK_STATUS_KEY=#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from SF_SECURITY_PUNISHMENT t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_REDUCE_PENALTY t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_COMMEND t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_WARNING_ORAL t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_WARNING t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_REVOKE_PROBATION t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_REVOKE_PAROLE t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_REVOKE_OUT_OF_PRISON t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')

select count(*) from SF_RECIDIVISM t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')>=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') and to_char(t.created,'yyyymm')<to_char(add_months(sysdate,0),'yyyymm')
select count(*) from SF_MOVE_IN t where t.group_Id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from SF_FINISH_REDRESS t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from SF_RECIDIVISM t left join SF_CULPRIT t2 on (t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id) where t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 18 then 1 else null end) as age18, count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 45 and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 18 then 1 else null end) as age45, count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 60 and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 45 then 1 else null end) as age60, count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 60 then 1 else null end) as ageUp from ( select case when length(t2.identification) = 18 then substr(t2.identification, 7, 4) when length(t2.identification) = 15 then '19'|| substr(t2.identification, 7, 2) end as born_year, t2.identification as identification from sf_culprit t2 where t2.created <= #{searchEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t2.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )t
